About

Shahar is graduating from UC Santa Cruz in June with a BS/BA in Biochemistry and Computer Science. He's a 5th year and vehemently insists that 5 is the new 4. Shahar's hobbies are surfing, rock climbing, and (soon) kitesurfing. His current interests are Docker, learning C++, and getting "real solid" at problem-solving using data structures. His not-current interests are music and finances. He lives in Santa Cruz.
